fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Target a player; shoot a missile at them, attacking them.
- Roleblock a player[Locked]

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may multitask
- After getting 2 kills, you unlock your second ability.
- After getting 3 kills, you have a 50% chance to bypass immunities.
- After getting 4 kills, you now have unstoppable attack.
- Upon getting 5 kills, you enable your ability: All Monkey(Military) and Monkey(Primary) may use there abilities twice.
